mainText:
I am 36 years old, and if I had to pick an Icon that embodied my 
lifetime (which is just over 3 decades of Incredible leaps in 
technology), I would have to say that person is Steve Jobs.

99% of the technology that I use is Apple Products. I live in a Apple 
Eco system because everything "just works" together. Thank you Steve for your contribution to this world, and to how I live 
my life today.

Thank you for everything.
header: Truly an Icon of my lifetime.
author: Kevin
